engine

Class RequestInterpreter

  • java.lang.Object
    • engine.RequestInterpreter

  • public class RequestInterpreter
extends java.lang.Object
    This request interpreter accept string or byte array from network controller and build a request model. This interpreter can understand both HTTP/1.0 and HTTP/0.9
    Author:
    Jiaqi LI

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RequestInterpreter(java.lang.String requestLine)
      Add request line to the request model, if request line is not understood, then request model will be leave null which indicates the bad request.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long getBodyLength()
      Get the length of received entity body, 0 means the request is either not understood or not a post method.
      long getContentLenght()
      Get the entity body length from the header "Content-Length", 0 means the request is either not understood or not a post request.
      RequestModel getRequestModel()
      Return the request model that RequestInterpreter constructed.
      boolean isBadRequest()
      return true if the request model has not been initialized.
      void processBody(char[] input)
      Append char[] to the request entity body.
      boolean processHeaders(java.lang.String header)
      Add a header to request model if the input string is not empty and the request line has been understood and the version of HTTP is not 0.9.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • RequestInterpreter

        public RequestInterpreter(java.lang.String requestLine)
        Add request line to the request model, if request line is not understood, then request model will be leave null which indicates the bad request.
        Parameters:
        requestLine - request line from network controller

    • Method Detail

      • isBadRequest

        public boolean isBadRequest()
        return true if the request model has not been initialized.
        Returns:
        true if the request model has not been initialized.

      • processHeaders

        public boolean processHeaders(java.lang.String header)
        Add a header to request model if the input string is not empty and the request line has been understood and the version of HTTP is not 0.9.
        Parameters:
        header - HTTP header
        Returns:
        true if successfully add a new header to the request model, false otherwise.

      • getContentLenght

        public long getContentLenght()
        Get the entity body length from the header "Content-Length", 0 means the request is either not understood or not a post request.
        Returns:
        the value of Content-Length header

      • getBodyLength

        public long getBodyLength()
        Get the length of received entity body, 0 means the request is either not understood or not a post method.
        Returns:
        the length of received entity body

      • processBody

        public void processBody(char[] input)
        Append char[] to the request entity body.
        Parameters:
        input - the char[] that to append to the body.

      • getRequestModel

        public RequestModel getRequestModel()
        Return the request model that RequestInterpreter constructed.
        Returns:
        Return the request model that RequestInterpreter constructed.
